entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
